prompt: Create a map view page with a full-screen map and a professional corporate style. Include a top app bar with the title 'Corporate Map' in white text, a dark blue background (Colors.blue[900]), and a white back arrow icon. Add a floating action button in the bottom-right corner with a white GPS icon and a dark blue background (Colors.blue[900]). The map area should have a light grey background (Colors.grey[200]) with a professional-looking 1px black border. Use Material Design with a focus on clean lines, high contrast, and a formal aesthetic. Add 8px padding around the map container.
